name: The bleeding
description:
Just another old mansion. 

Just another old story.

Just another horror game.

WARNING. In the game there are elements of violence, also the game has no save mode.

Music from these guys:

Thing On A Spring - One Rainy Night

Thing On A Spring - 8 Bit Spleen

ModTomIT - Machine in the Ghost

FAiRLiGHT - Shadow Man intro

Yerzmyey - Get Mad

Pelthunter - Boss Fight

RESURRECTiON - Trojan Remover 6.4.8kg

TMG - STRANGLEHOL

CORE - Simpukka ChilliD

P.S. I hope you will like this game
